result.reason: Issue body is empty and provides no reproduction steps, mRemoteNG version, OS version, or description of the foreground/focus failure behavior; may be an Intel HD 520 driver-specific window activation quirk that requires more context to diagnose.
result.approach: Request mRemoteNG version, Windows version, Intel HD 520 driver version, and whether disabling hardware acceleration (or toggling DwmExtendFrameIntoClientArea) resolves the issue.
